Root.p: The NERO Rule Book 9th Edition is dedicated to Fran Moore and Joe Cali,

Fran Moore passed away in October of 2010. Fran was one of the most prominent writers of the Tyrran Campaign she and several others shaping the Tyran World as we know it today. Fran was and continues to be, an inspiration to us all.

Joe Cali, a veteran player and long time supporter of NERO, passed away on June 18th, 2011 Joe was a man with a warm heart who always had a smile on his face. His home, hearth, and kitchen were always open to anyone in need. His presence in our world will be sourly missed
